title: Bored Diamond player looking to do ranked 3's. Must be high plat or diamond.

replies.body: Hi diamond 5 last season im interested

If you don't find anyone willing to do 3's would you be willing to play a few with a silver/gold noob, been having a tough time re-climbing after fail'd promos and need a little time with players who can handle no feeding their lane so hard that it's 3-20 at 10 min ahaha
